original_title: Larry Carlton & Lee Ritenour - After The Rain - Live in Japan 1995
overview: This was recorded live at Shibuya Bunkamura, Orchard Hall, Tokyo Japan on June 3rd 1995. Tracks include: Crosstown Kids, Closed Door Jam, Low Steppin', Remembering JP, After the Rain, Larry's Blues, Smiles and Smiles To Go, Wes Bound, Etude, Take That, Lee's Solo, 4 on 6, Room 335, and LA Underground.
title: Larry Carlton & Lee Ritenour - After The Rain - Live in Japan 1995
